name: Close Quarters
passives: Deal additional Weapon Damage when in close range to your target.

name: Headshot Booster
passives: Deal bonus Weapon Damage with headshots

name: Hollow Point Ward
passives: When you are above 60% health, deal additional Weapon Damage.

name: Restorative Shot
passives: Your next bullet will heal you based on what target you hit.

name: Active Reload
passives: Passive: While reloading, pressing [R] during the highlighted portion will instantly finish your reload and grant you Fire Rate and Bullet Lifesteal.

name: Berserker
passives: Your Weapon Damage increases as you take sustained damage.

name: Kinetic Dash
passives: Your next Dash-Jump does not cost an extra stamina and you gain Fire Rate and bonus Ammo until your next reload. Lasts up to 8s.

name: Long Range
passives: Deal additional Weapon Damage when beyond a minimum distance from your target.

name: Melee Charge
passives: Increases your Heavy Melee charge distance. When you perform a Heavy Melee attack against an enemy, your weapon reloads instantly.

name: Mystic Shot
passives: Your next bullet deals bonus Spirit Damage

name: Soul Shredder Bullets
passives: Your Bullets apply a debuff that amplifies your Spirit Damage against the target and grants you Spirit Lifesteal against them

name: Fleetfoot
passives: Removes the Movement Speed penalty while shooting.
hasActives: Gain bonus Movement Speed and Ammo.

name: Burst Fire
passives: Briefly gain Fire Rate and Move Speed when one of your bullets hits an enemy hero

name: Escalating Resilience
passives: Grants Bullet Resist when your bullets hit an enemy hero. Each shot can only grant one stack.

name: Headhunter
passives: Landing a headshot deals bonus damage, heals you for a portion of your Max HP, and briefly grants you bonus move speed.

name: Hunter's Aura
passives: Reduces nearby enemies' Bullet Resist and Fire Rate. If there is only one enemy hero nearby, this effect is tripled.

name: Intensifying Magazine
passives: Increases Weapon Damage as you continuously fire your weapon.

name: Point Blank
passives: When in close range to your target, gain Weapon Damage and your bullets apply a Movement Slow

name: Pristine Emblem
passives: Your attacks have additional Weapon Damage against enemies above 50% health.

name: Sharpshooter
passives: Deal additional Weapon Damage when beyond a minimum distance from your target.

name: Tesla Bullets
passives: Your bullets have a chance to shock your target. The shock will jump to a nearby enemy.

name: Toxic Bullets
passives: Your bullets build up a Bleed on enemies, causing them to lose a percentage of their current health over time. Also applies Healing Reduction on the bleeding target.

name: Alchemical Fire
actives: Throw a flask that explodes on contact, creating an area that does increasing Spirit Damage per second and causes enemies to receive additional Weapon Damage from your team.

name: Heroic Aura
passives: Provides Fire Rate to nearby player minions.
hasActives: Provides bonus Movement Speed and Fire Rate to you and nearby allies.

name: Warp Stone
actives: Teleport straight ahead, gaining Bullet Resist.

name: Crippling Headshot
passives: Headshots reduce target's Bullet and Spirit Resist.

name: Frenzy
passives: While you are below 40% health, you gain stat bonuses.

name: Glass Cannon
passives: Each hero kill grants permanent Weapon Damage (up to a max of 7 times). Death results in loss of 1 stack.

name: Lucky Shot
passives: Your bullets have a chance to be empowered, causing them to deal bonus damage and Slow on hit.

name: Ricochet
passives: Your bullets will ricochet on enemies near your target, applying any bullet procs and dealing a percentage of the original damage.

name: Siphon Bullets
passives: Your bullets temporarily steal Max HP from enemies. Enemies regain their stolen health when the debuff expires. Permanently steal one stack of health if a siphoned target dies and lose 2 stacks if you die.

name: Spiritual Overflow
passives: Gain bonus Spirit Power by charging up with your bullets on enemy heroes.

name: Silencer
actives: For the next 4s, all your bullets immediately apply Silence. Silence prevents targets from using abilities.

name: Vampiric Burst
actives: Grants Lifesteal, Fire Rate, and Ammo. This added Ammo is not limited by your max magazine size.

name: Melee Lifesteal
passives: Your melee attacks heal you for 20% of the Melee Damage dealt plus 90. This heal is 40% effective vs non-heroes.

name: Healing Rite
actives: Grant Regen and Sprint Speed to the target. Gets dispelled if you take damage from enemy players or objectives. Can be self-cast.

name: Combat Barrier
passives: When you have a Bullet Shield, gain Weapon Damage and Fire Rate.

name: Debuff Reducer
passives: Reduces the duration of all negative effects applied to you.

name: Enchanter's Barrier
passives: While you have a Spirit Shield, gain bonus Spirit Power and Cooldown Reduction.

name: Enduring Speed
passives: Reduces the effects of enemy Movement Slow

name: Healbane
passives: Your Spirit Damage applies Healing Reduction. If an enemy hero dies under this effect, you receive a large heal.

name: Healing Booster
passives: Increases the effectiveness of your Healing and increases your resistance to healing reduction.

name: Reactive Barrier
passives: Automatically deploy temporary Bullet and Spirit Shields when you are movement locked, Stunned, Chained, Immobilized, or Slept.

name: Divine Barrier
actives: Provide the target with Bullet Shield, Spirit Shield, and Movement Speed. Can be self-cast.

name: Health Nova
actives: Heal yourself and nearby allies. Heals an additional 20% per ally.

name: Restorative Locket
passives: When an enemy uses an ability within 50m range from you, store one Restoration Stack.
hasActives: Consume all stacks to heal target ally. If used at the max stacks it replenishes a stamina point on the target. Can be self-cast.

name: Return Fire
actives: Automatically fire a bullet towards any attacker who damages you with their abilities or weapon.

name: Fortitude
passives: After not taking damage for 11s, gain 4% Max Health Regen.

name: Lifestrike
passives: Your Melee Attack applies Movement Slow and heals you for 55% of the Melee Damage dealt plus 110. This heal is 40% effective vs non-heroes.

name: Superior Stamina
passives: Increases the number of Air Dashes and Air Jumps that can be performed before landing from 1 to 2

name: Veil Walker
passives: Walking through a cosmic veil grants you Stealth, increased Movement Speed, restores all Bullet and Spirit Shields, and grants bonus Fire Rate for your next magazine.

name: Debuff Remover
passives: Reduces the duration of all negative effects applied to you.
hasActives: Purge all negative effects currently applied to you. If any effects were removed, gain a movement speed bonus.
Cannot be used while Stunned or Slept.

name: Majestic Leap
actives: Launch yourself high into the air. While in the air, you can use the active again to drop down faster.
Cannot be used for 5s if attacked by enemy Hero.

name: Metal Skin
actives: Become immune to bullets and melee attacks.

name: Rescue Beam
actives: Heals a target allied hero and yourself for a percentage of Max Health. Once while healing, you can Pull the target towards you. Can be self-cast.

name: Inhibitor
passives: Your bullets apply Movement Slow and reduce the target's outgoing damage on hit.

name: Soul Rebirth
passives: If you die, after 4s you will respawn at your death location with partial health.

name: Colossus
actives: Gain Bullet and Spirit Resist, and slow the movement and dash speed of enemies nearby. Your model size grows by 20%.

name: Phantom Strike
actives: Teleport to an enemy target, applying Disarm, Slow, and dealing damage.

name: Shadow Weave
actives: Become Stealthed. Whenever you take damage while Stealthed you get briefly revealed.
Attacking or using an ability will end your stealth and start an ambush, temporarily granting you bonus Fire Rate and Spirit Power

name: Unstoppable
actives: Supress negative status effects and become Immune to Stun, Silence, Sleep, Root, and Disarm.

name: Ammo Scavenger
passives: Any time you secure or deny a Soul you get ammo back and gain stacking Spirit Power

name: Mystic Burst
passives: Abilities deal bonus Spirit Damage if they deal 80 damage or more in a single hit.

name: Mystic Reach
description: Increases the range and effect radius of your abilities and items.

name: Spirit Strike
passives: When you perform a Light or Heavy Melee attack against a hero, deal Extra Spirit Damage with the attack and reduce the target's Spirit Resist

name: Infuser
actives: Gain Spirit Power and Spirit Lifesteal.

name: Bullet Resist Shredder
passives: Reduces Bullet Resist on enemies when you deal Spirit Damage.

name: Duration Extender
description: Increases the Duration of your abilities and items.

name: Improved Cooldown
description: Reduces the Cooldown of your abilities and items.

name: Mystic Vulnerability
passives: When the target takes Spirit Damage, they have their Spirit Resist reduced.

name: Quicksilver Reload
passives: Imbue an ability with bonus Spirit Damage on the first hit.  When the ability is used, your weapon is reloaded and has a Fire Rate bonus for that clip.

name: Suppressor
passives: When you deal Spirit Damage to enemies, you also apply Fire Rate Slow.

name: Cold Front
actives: Release an expanding ice blast that deals Spirit Damage and Slows targets it hits.

name: Decay
actives: Reduces healing received of targeted enemy and inflicts damage over time of their current health. Decay's damage is non-lethal.

name: Slowing Hex
actives: Deals Spirit Damage and Slows targets movement and dashes. Also Silences their movement-based items and abilities. Does not affect target's stamina usage.

name: Withering Whip
actives: Target an enemy to apply Fire Rate Slow and reduce their Bullet Resist.

name: Improved Burst
passives: Abilities deal bonus Spirit Damage if they deal 125 damage or more in a single hit.
Targets are immune to the effects of Improved Burst for 5s after taking damage from it.

name: Improved Reach
passives: Increases the range and effect radius of your abilities and items.

name: Mystic Slow
passives: If a target takes Spirit damage, they have their Movement Speed and Fire Rate reduced.

name: Superior Duration
description: Increases the duration of your abilities and items.

name: Surge of Power
passives: Imbue an ability with permanent Spirit Power. When that ability is used, gain bonus Movement Speed and Fire Rate Bonus for a duration of 6s.

name: Torment Pulse
passives: Periodically deals Spirit Damage to the 2 closest enemies nearby.

name: Ethereal Shift
actives: You enter a void state and become untargetable and invincible for a short duration, during which you cannot move or perform any actions.
Afterwards you instantly reload and gain bonus Spirit Power.

name: Knockdown
actives: Target is knocked down and Stunned after a 2s delay, interrupting and temporarily preventing them from taking any action.

name: Silence Glyph
actives: Fires a projectile which silences and damages the target. Silence does not interrupt channeling abilities.

name: Diviner's Kevlar
passives: Upon casting an ultimate ability gain temporary Bullet Shield, Spirit Shield, and Spirit Power.

name: Escalating Exposure
passives: Dealing Spirit Damage applies a stacking Spirit Amp that increases your Spirit Damage to the target.

name: Mystic Reverb
passives: Imbue an ability to apply slow in a radius around the target and deal an additional percentage of the damage dealt to enemies around the target after a short delay.

name: Curse
actives: Curses an enemy - interrupting, Siliencing, Disarming, and preventing item usage.

name: Echo Shard
actives: Reset the cooldown of your most recently used non-ultimate ability.

name: Magic Carpet
actives: Summon a Magic Carpet that will fly you away and gain Bullet and Spirit Shields. Cannot use abilities while the carpet is being summoned. While flying you are immune to slows and doing any action will dismiss the carpet.

name: Refresher
actives: Reset the cooldown of all your abilities and restore all your charges
